title: Doomsday Cult Sanctuary Adventure #3
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Initiation Chamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit circular room with stone walls covered in apocalyptic murals. Black candles flicker on iron stands, casting dancing shadows. In the center, a stone altar bears strange symbols. The air is thick with incense and an unsettling sense of devotion. Crimson robes hang on hooks along the walls.

items.name: ceremonial stone altar
items.description: A dark stone altar with carved symbols and burn marks from countless rituals

items.name: ceremonial dagger
items.description: A silver dagger with cult symbols etched into the blade

items.name: offering chest
items.description: A wooden chest where initiates leave their worldly possessions

items.name: founder's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal belonging to the cult's founder
items.text: I, Prophet Ezekiel, established the Sanctuary of the Final Dawn in the year 1984. When the stars align and the seventh seal breaks, we shall ascend from the Sacred Vault beneath the mountain. Only the faithful shall know the way.

items.name: iron candle stand
items.description: A tall stand holding seven black candles, representing the seven seals

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: An old brass key with a sun symbol engraved on it

items.name: apocalyptic mural
items.description: A disturbing painting showing the end of the world and figures ascending to salvation
items.text: The mural depicts Prophet Ezekiel leading his followers to the Sacred Vault. Above them, seven stars shine in the darkness. At the bottom, an inscription reads: 'The faithful shall answer the three questions of enlightenment.'

items.name: heavy wooden door
items.description: A thick door carved with symbols of the sun and moon, leading deeper into the sanctuary

rooms.name: Sacred Library
rooms.description: A musty library filled with shelves of ancient texts, prophecies, and cult doctrine. Dust motes float in shafts of light from high windows. A large reading table dominates the center, covered in open books and scrolls. The walls are lined with portraits of cult elders.

items.name: reading table
items.description: A heavy oak table covered with sacred texts and prophecies

items.name: scroll of prophecy
items.description: An ancient scroll containing the cult's core prophecy
items.text: The Prophecy of the Final Dawn: When the world ends in fire and darkness, the faithful shall gather in the Sacred Vault beneath the mountain. There, Prophet Ezekiel shall lead them to salvation beyond the veil.

items.name: portrait of Prophet Ezekiel
items.description: A large painting of a stern man with piercing eyes, wearing ceremonial robes
items.text: Prophet Ezekiel - Founder and Eternal Guide. Born 1940, received the vision in 1984. His wisdom illuminates the path to salvation.

items.name: portrait of Elder Sarah
items.description: A painting of a woman in white robes holding a book
items.text: Elder Sarah - Keeper of Sacred Texts. She maintains the library and teaches new initiates the ways of enlightenment.

items.name: portrait of Elder Marcus
items.description: A painting of a bearded man holding a staff
items.text: Elder Marcus - Guardian of the Sanctum. He protects the High Priest's chambers and ensures only the worthy may enter.

items.name: tall bookshelf
items.description: A massive shelf filled with leather-bound volumes of cult teachings

items.name: book of doctrine
items.description: A thick volume outlining the cult's beliefs and practices
items.text: Chapter 7: The Sacred Vault - The vault lies beneath the mountain, accessible only through the High Priest's Sanctum. It is the place of final gathering, where the faithful await the end times.

items.name: ornate silver key
items.description: A decorative silver key with intricate engravings

items.name: sanctum door
items.description: An imposing door leading to the High Priest's private chambers. A bronze plaque displays three questions that must be answered.

password_questions.question: Who founded the Sanctuary?
password_questions.hint: Check the founder's journal and the portraits

password_questions.question: Where do the faithful gather for salvation?
password_questions.hint: Read the prophecy scroll and the book of doctrine

password_questions.question: What lies beneath the mountain?
password_questions.hint: The doctrine book mentions what is beneath the mountain

rooms.name: High Priest's Sanctum
rooms.description: The private chamber of the cult's leader. Rich tapestries hang from the walls, depicting scenes of apocalypse and rebirth. A grand desk sits before a stained glass window showing a rising sun. In the corner, a hidden passage has been revealed behind a moved bookcase, leading to freedom.

items.name: high priest's desk
items.description: An ornate desk made of dark wood, covered with maps and documents

items.name: escape route map
items.description: A hand-drawn map showing a secret tunnel leading out of the sanctuary
items.text: Emergency Exit: In case of raid or danger, use the hidden passage behind the eastern bookcase. It leads through the mountain to the outside world. Only the High Priest knows of this route.

items.name: stained glass window
items.description: A beautiful window depicting a sun rising over mountains
items.text: The window shows the sun of enlightenment rising over the sanctuary, symbolizing the cult's promise of salvation.

items.name: high priest's robes
items.description: Elaborate robes hanging on a stand, adorned with gold thread and symbols

items.name: hidden passage
items.description: A narrow stone passage revealed behind a moved bookcase. Cool air flows from within, carrying the scent of freedom.

rooms.name: Mountain Exit
rooms.description: You emerge from the tunnel into bright sunlight on the mountainside. Fresh air fills your lungs as you look back at the dark entrance to the sanctuary. Below, you can see a road leading to civilization. You are free!

items.name: winding mountain path
items.description: A steep path leading down the mountain to safety

rooms.win_message: You have escaped the Doomsday Cult Sanctuary! The fresh mountain air and sunlight wash away the darkness of the cult's influence. You are finally free from their grasp. You win!
